subject: Weight Lifting
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The weight lifting coach for Greece, Christos Iakovou, was suspended after 11 lifters tested positive for banned substances. The athletes’ names were not released pending confirmation of the tests from March 7. Greece has won 10 Olympic medals, including 5 golds, since Iakovou, 60, became the coach in 1988.
